marklogic.body: So i see a charon is about to jump into bos on alt. I dock to switch to hype and warp to gate pounce as it jumped. I get to gate, its support warps Off o.0 and I get tackle and chewing through it as i Burn closer. Everything starts coming back and i know im gonna die. Look away to pop a pill and SOME FUCKING HOW im now 14km from the the thing. I manage to get tackle again and die with it in low armor. I capped out to shit so unless its the legion with neuts I only seen the drake with a neut on me tbh. very annoyed at this, freighter shoulda died and would have if i had noticed i was moving outta range
